channel.title: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server
channel.description: cant find a tutorial that can help so here i am. I need a new ip banner that works Example: when i ipban them, they can log on another account then when the log off THEN its banned. I DO NOT want that i need a working one please.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2008, 06:49:41 pm[/size][hr]please help syipkpker is going on my server crashing it

item.title: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server
item.dc:creator: @wildof_death wildof death
item.description:
@wildof_death wrote:

I ip-banned from files so he can’t log on but on my runserver it says he is trying 2 log in but he ip banned so he can’t log in and crash my server

-some dude is asking can i be admin or IL crash Ur server what chances il give u admin?
-Fucking hate them holy fuck there that stupid?
-threatening the owner for admin simple /idiots

-WHO the fuck made the program any way fucking jackass dum fucking idiot /shit!!!

I do not want this to happen.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 05, 2008, 07:11:03 am[/size][hr]just someone send me a code for a working ip ban

item.source: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server

item.title: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server
item.dc:creator: @sparkzscape sparkzscape
item.description:
@sparkzscape wrote:

Search “Allowing one connection per ip”
Ip-banning WILL not work.

One connection per ip, means that it only allows one log in per ip, this stops nulls / syi

Read full topic
item.source: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server

item.title: Ipban help gay stupid syipkpker noob is crashing my server
item.dc:creator: @alysonj9 alysonj9
item.description:
@alysonj9 wrote:

Go into char files then fine syipkpker then open it then you will find somthing like this
character-lastconnection = (right here copy the ip / hostname ) then go into data and paste it there , save then restart and wala gone!

Read full topic

I wasn’t arguing, you called me out, for no reason. That yugioh is a troll. A troll is a person who purposely derails topics with idiocy. If you haven’t realized that, your blind. Yugioh want’s to get lulz out of this forum by being an idiot, so i called him out for it like numerous other people. For some reason, you felt some need to call me out, and start this. So don’t pin it on me.

/end not coming back to this fail-hole.
